In the savage heart of chaos, Aelfric Cynewulf reigns as the High Zar of the Ironwolf Tribe. A warband of marauding chaos warriors, eager to ravage the South Lands, follows his every command. As the alpha of a wolf pack, he leads with an iron fist, his authority unchallenged among the relentless chaos horde. A mighty champion within the ranks of chaos, Cynewulf's allegiance is a coveted prize, sought by many who seek the power and ferocity that the Ironwolf Tribe brings to the tumultuous lands of the Old World.
